title: Tales Of Old: Greek Mythology Volume 2
description: Greek mythology has stood the test of time as the stories are passed down from one generation to the next. Now the most exciting adventures have been brought to you as short stories. With eight action packed retellings, follow the adventures of gods and heroes alike as they attempt to slay monsters, and each other...Volume II retells the tale of Daedalus and Icarus, Pgymalion and his search for love, the fall of Arachne, Orpheus’ tragic journey into the Underworld, Prometheus’ punishment, Echo’s tragedy, the story of Pandora and her terrible box, and the birth of Athens.
author: Johnathon Nicolaou
